snippet: The White House put pressure on states to expand Medicaid but officials also said the states could reverse their decision at any time.
abstract: Obama administration advises states to expand Medicaid or risk losing federal money; at the same time, federal health officials also say states are free to reverse their decision at any time.
lead_paragraph: The White House put pressure on states to expand Medicaid but officials also said the states could reverse their decision at any time.

headline.seo: U.S. Advises States to Expand Medicaid or Risk Losing Funds
headline.main: Administration Advises States to Expand Medicaid or Risk Losing Federal Money
headline.print_headline: Administration Advises States to Expand Medicaid or Risk Losing Federal Money

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
